그것을: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1a' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E8D5F2;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#D4A5E8;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad1b' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F2E8D5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E8C5A5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='glow1'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E8D5F2;stop-opacity:0'/></radialGradient><filter id='shadow1'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='8'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='8' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.3'/></feComponentTransfer><feMerge><feMergeNode/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='110' rx='85' ry='75' fill='#C5A8D8' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='70' fill='url(#grad1a)' filter='url(#shadow1)'/><path d='M 80 100 Q 100 70 120 100 T 140 100' fill='none' stroke='url(#grad1b)' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='30' fill='url(#glow1)'/><path d='M 90 90 L 110 90 M 90 110 L 110 110' stroke='#B895D5' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.6'/></svg>
